heading: HB01720
0: AN ACT SEPARATING THE SAN ISIDRO NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL – CALABNIGAN ANNEX IN BARANGAY CALABNIGAN, MUNICIPALITY OF LIBMANAN, PROVINCE OF CAMARINES SUR FROM THE SAN ISIDRO NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL, CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS CALABNIGAN NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL
status: Pending with the Committee on BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE since 2019-07-24
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01720
FULL TITLE : AN ACT SEPARATING THE SAN ISIDRO NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL – CALABNIGAN ANNEX IN BARANGAY CALABNIGAN, MUNICIPALITY OF LIBMANAN, PROVINCE OF CAMARINES SUR FROM THE SAN ISIDRO NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL, CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS CALABNIGAN NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL
